## bjd

### Read rawdata

> 행정표준코드관리시스템 -> 법정동코드목록조회

```{r}
bjd <- read_tsv("data/rawdata/bjd.txt")
bjd
```

### Normalization

```{r}
bjd_res <- bjd %>% 
  dplyr::filter(폐지여부 == "존재") %>% 
  select(-폐지여부) %>% 
  mutate(loadingtime = now())
```

### Save RDS

```{r}
saveRDS(bjd_res, "data/code_info/bjd.rds")
```
